actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that an alien may not be paid supplemental security income benefits unless he not only is a permanent resident of the United States but has also continuously resided in the United States for at least one year.

summary.text: Amends title XVI of the Social Security Act to prohibit the payment of supplementary security income benefits to an alien unless he is a permanent resident of the United States and has continuously resided therein for at least one year.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that an alien may not be paid supplemental security income benefits unless he not only is a permanent resident of the United States but has also continuously resided in the United States for at least one year.
